recipesJson.name: Mango Dragonfruit Refresher w/ Blackberry Inclusion -Starbucks Drink
recipesJson.author: Vishousvapez
recipesJson.description:
TPA-Blackberry-(0.15%)-This is a very potent flavor be careful when using it really potent i tend to stay under 1% with this one but under that percentage it gives the blueberry hint i need(my first ever mix was using this at 5% was not fun at all couldn't get the taste of blackberry out of my mouth and tank for a week) 

INW-Dragon-fruit-(1.50%) this is the closest thing to genuine dragon fruit on the market and it gives you the dragon fruit hints you would get from the drink

LorAnn-Lemonade-(3.00%) this in my opinion is one of the best lemonades on the market give a nice mouth feel as well and is tart which the blackberry counters give the mix a nic lemonade base to work off of

TPA-Strawberry Ripe-(1.00%)just a hint of this to help bring everything together and brighten up things and make everything pop

CAP-Sweet Mango-(1.50%) i tend to stay under 2% with this one because it starts starting overripe at higher percentages for me at least

optional sweetener & ws-23 to your liking I use one drop cap SS per 15 ml (Thats the only thing i measure in drops) (Wayne Recommends 0.5% of CAP-Fizz Pop) 

hope you enjoy as much as i did btw if you haven't tried this from Starbucks try it:
(Venti mango dragon-fruit refresher with lemonade base add blackberry inclusions ,you will want the venti size also it has same amount of caffeine as a cup of coffee)

reviews.text: I bought the actual drink from Starbucks before vaping this so I could compare the juice directly to the drink, and holy crap. It is about as close as you can get to recreating the actual drink in vape form. I added 1% WS-23 and .5% CAP SS, but I like my teas cold and sweet. For "normal" people, you probably don't need more than .25% sweetener, if any.
This really is a refreshing juice.  Its sweet and a tiny bit tart drink.  Can't believe Cap Sweet Mango works so well here.

This recently joined the ranks of my favorite summer vapes. Refreshing, well balanced, and accurate to the beverage, all accomplished without requiring the use of any special-order flavors, you should just mix this up and see for yourself.
